name: Dead by daylight
description: Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer survival horror game where one player is a relentless Killer and the other four are Survivors trying to escape. Survivors must work together to repair generators to power the exit gates, while the Killer hunts and sacrifices them to a malevolent entity. The gameplay is a deadly game of cat and mouse, and the game features numerous crossovers with famous horror franchises.
